DOC.brief_summary: In the following randomized, crossover study, the investigators test the hypothesis that ease of insertion and oropharyngeal leak pressure differ between the LMA ProSealTM and the i-GelTM in anesthetized pediatric patients.
DOC.brief_title: The i-GelTM. A Randomized, Crossover Study With the Laryngeal Mask Airway ProSealTM in Anesthetized Pediatric Patients
DOC.criteria: ASA I and II Age 1.56 years known or predicted difficult airway body mass index > 35 kg m2 risk of aspiration
